ygData.subject: Re: get this
ygData.msgSnippet: Think about it this way, when somebody is a level better than you at sports, you don t even touch the ball.  levels should be considered to be dynamic.  you
ygData.messageBody:
Think about it this way, when somebody is a level better than you at sports, you don't even touch the ball. levels should be considered to be dynamic. you shouldn't stand a chance against people of other levels, and people who are high in your level should also beat you because they have probably maxed out their skills, while you still need to. that's my interpretation of it.

Kakrot, DEF level 9
Innoruuk


> ** Original Subject: [shadowknight] Re: get this
> ** Original Sender: Seamus McNeill <smcneill@...>
> ** Original Date: Tue, 4 May 1999 15:53:24 -0400 (EDT)

> ** Original Message follows...

>
> From: Seamus McNeill <smcneill@...>
>
> thats just sad that a druid a level higher than you wiped the floor with
> you...something needs to be done about this.
>
> Korm
